property.subtitle: Large Studio for rent & sale
property.description:
Large 76 sqm. studio with balcony, very quiet and with a good view. The studio is fully furnished and contains: • Air Conditioning • Electrolux Washing machine • 2 TV's (flat screen) 50" LG-TV and 32" LG-TV, Radio & DVD player • Cable television with English/French/Italian/Dutch/Russian channels from Sophon Cable TV • A separated bedroom division with king size bed • A living room with a very comfortable big leather sofa • Balcony with table and chairs • The kitchen is fully equipped (no stove) – (Halogen oven can be provided) • Electronic lock – access card also for lift access. • Electronic safety deposit box
The Condominium was completed in 2004 and is in top condition. Furthermore the complex has a 15m communal swimming pool, car park with automated gate and a 24 hour security-service
In the surrounding area you can find many good restaurants, cafes, markets with fresh food, shops, gym, beauty salons, bars & massages.
Booth of motorbike taxis or car is just around the corner and the bus station to Suvarnabhumi is located in just 500m distance.

Also within walking distance are some excellent restaurants and pubs, as well as some great beer bars etc.

property.subtitle: Exclusive Luxury Pattaya Property Diamond Villa for Sale
property.description: Luxury 4 bedroom Diamond Villa near Phoenix Golf Course for sale. This luxurious 4 bedroom villa is now on the market exclusively with Global Property. It is located on the beautiful championship Phoenix golf course in Huay Yai Pattaya. This stunning diamond villa sits on land of over 5000m2, it boasts 1 master bedroom with ensuite and 3 further guest bedrooms and bathrooms. It also has a separate guest house and fitness room. Set within the landscaped gardens is the 8 x 14m pool which has room for around 10 bathers and the added luxury of a pool bar for all those wonderful warm evenings and special occasions. The villa has back up generators, dual well water supply and its own power supply system. The state of the art video monitoring system and a 3metre high security wall means that the estate is well protected and that you can sleep easy knowing you are safe and secure. The lush well maintained gardens have there own automated sprinkler system and at night are impressively illuminated by a time controlled system. While a property such as this would suit virtually everyone, being located on a high quality golf course it would most certainly particularly suit a golf enthusiast. For the active Phoenix Golf has many kilometres of private roads, perfect for walking and cycling and is only a short drive away from the beautiful beaches of NaJomtien, Ban Amphur and Bang Saray This stunning property certainly has to be viewed to see and appreciate its full glory.

property.subtitle: Luxury 5 bedroom poolvilla with mountain view
property.description: This villa/mansion is a massive 5 bedrooms,6 bathrooms 535 Sqm with a large infinity pool and no less than 2 Jacuzzis. The villa is fully furnished for over 2 million baht and has everything you need for a great stay. It features 7 TV's and a 65” UHD TV with soundbar around the house with International Cable TV package. It has a large living and dining room and an even larger BBQ corner terrace on the 2nd floor with space for 20 dining guests. It comes with a fully equipped white Scandinavian high-gloss kitchen, with all appliances for fine dining. The villa have a double car park with remote-controlled gate. Separate laundry and storage room with washing machine. The villa has LED-lights throughout the house and pools, and a CCTV/alarm system. It has its own water well and a clean drinking water system. Located directly on Phoenix Golf Course near Pattaya, this 3 floor Mega Mansion is surrounded by nature in a very quiet and private area. It has a spectacular 360-degree view over the golf course all the way out to Jomtien Beach. You can even enjoy the views from the Jacuzzi on the large roof top terrace. Bang Saray Beach, Jomtien Beach and Ocean Marina Yacht Club is only 2 km away and a 20 min taxi ride will take you into Pattaya with all its attractions. Many other attractions are very close by, including the Floating Market, Underwater World, Cartoon Network Water Park, Nong Nuch Tropical Gardens etc. Several of Pattayas highest rated restaurants (Glass House, Rimpa Lapin, The Silver lake vineyard) are all located just 5-10 minutes from the villa. The villa is located at a unique spot inside Phoenix Gold Golf & Country Club where you can enjoy the facilities of 24-hour security, tennis course, and swimming pool, clubhouse with a pro golf shop, restaurant and locker rooms. The gated and highly secured Phoenix area has a size of 1.000 rai (1.6 square km) with 3 golf courses (27 holes, Lake, Mountain, designed by the renowned golf course designer, Denis Griffiths, and recently renovated by Thailand's leading golf course architect Pirapon Namatra of Golf East. Just walk a few meters, and you will be ready to tee off, as this unique villa is located right next to the golf course. The golf course has 27 holes split into 3 sections (Mountain, Lakes and Ocean), so you will experience a lot of beautiful nature while you are playing.

property.subtitle: Luxury 4 bedroom poolvilla inside Phoenix Golf Club
property.description: Located directly inside the famous Phoenix Golf & Country Club just outside Pattaya and less than 2 km from the beautiful Jomtien Beach you can rent this amazing 3-floor luxury villa with a spectacular view over the golf course from the roof-top with a romantic outdoor jacuzzi and all the way to Jomtien Beach and the famous Buddha Mountain. Inside the 435 sqm. villa designed by a famous Danish designer in 2015 and in perfect condition you will find 4 large designer bedrooms all fully equipped with TVs, 65” UHD TV with soundbar and more than 300 TV-channels, cooling fans and low-noise air conditioners as well as stylish decoration, indirect lighting, designer furniture and 5 bathrooms - one with a jacuzzi overlooking the beautiful landscape. The black and white Scandinavian kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, large fridge, ice machine, safe and clean drinkable water system, cooking island and everything you need. Next to the dining area is an entertainment area with one of totals of 7 flat screen LED TVs in the villa and with 300+ international TV-channels, DVD-player, DVD-collection and a sound system. Outside the villa is a large, colorful infinity salt water pool with 7 color options, outdoor shower, BBQ corner with large gas grill, lounge area in the shade, sun bathing area, separate laundry room etc. Everything is surrounded by a tropical garden with fruit trees and a double car park with remote-controlled access gate. The villa is secured with 12 infrared and high-definition cameras, motion sensors with lights all around the property and a high-end alarm system with sensors on all doors and windows. The villa is safely located inside the Phoenix Golf & Country Club and access is restricted and controlled by security at the entrance gate. The Phoenix Golf & Country Club has three stunning golf courses designer by Denis Griffiths and recently renovated by Thailand's leading golf course architect Pirapon Namatra of Golf East and with a total of 27 holes and a large club house with restaurant, large swimming pool, tennis courts and lots of amenities for everyone to enjoy.

Two of the main bedrooms open onto swimming pool, and other bedrooms have sliding doors that open onto the lawn garden, this garden is also viewed and accessed directly from the private working office room. There is a spacious 2 car parking port with additional space for multiple motorbike parking. From the back entrance you will find the guest toilet and separate utility area. The location of the village is just off Mabprachan Lake and very close to the world renowned, Siam Country Club Golf Courses. It is ideal for expat families, especially if working in Laem Chabang, Rayong or Bangkok and/or with children studying at any of the International schools nearby as there is easy access to the 36 and 7 highways. The lake area is absolutely beautiful with a brand new public park area and serviced by some great quality restaurants, convenience stores are located close-by and are no more than a 5 minute trip.

property.subtitle: Beachfront Condo in Wongamat
property.description: Elegant surroundings Long Beach, Wong Amat, is an area of unmatched natural beauty in Pattaya. Situated less than 50m from the beach and rising 38-storeys skywards, The Tower is positioned in a tranquil, seafront environment, and is yet conveniently situated only minutes from downtown Pattaya. Enjoy the waves while windsurfing, sailing or swimming; anything is possible at the Tower State-of-the-art design All apartments and public spaces in the Tower offer endless vistas from morning to night thanks to the transparent glass walls from floor to ceiling. State-of-the-art engineering enables other key features such as a soaring 13-meter high lobby area and fewer structural columns throughout the building for increased livable floor space.

property.subtitle: Warehouse - Sale Or Rent in Pattaya
property.description:
Reasonable priced Land & Factory Warehouse - Sale Or Rent Valuable Land with Warehouse-Factory for rent or sale in Pattaya and close to sea (100 mt to the beach). This is the best location and best value for a production factory workshop or a strategic warehouse in central city location. The factory is 2.400 square meters (1,5 rai) total, all walled around the full perimeter with three big gates-access; land was all filled up 1,5 meters in construction; the whole area is all covered with high roof (9 mt) and with offices with toilet, kitchen, store rooms (3), meeting room, workshops, road front shop and factory-warehouse separate toilet. Three large doors on three different roads access to load or unload in the factory-warehouse. The facility has 220/380V power supply (3 phases) and is connected to the common water supply. Other factory feature: built in air compressor line system, aerial electricity system, halogen lighting, CCTV 20 cameras security system, Telephone line, Septic tank. The factory is key turn ready to move in and available as well a manufacturing license related to the place. Price for sale or rent related to the place. All area can be divided in three parts of 800 sq mt each (200 Tarang wah each) or different sizes as it is served by three different roads-soi and doors. Absolutely nice plots on corner of main road Na-Jomtien and facing two other government roads. These iconic high towers have two buildings with 67 stories (Tower A) and 48 stories (Tower B) that will be located in the heart of Pattaya. From this ideal location it will be just a few minutes travel to all the popular streets such as Soi Buakhao, Walking Street and all the famous Shopping malls like Central Festival and restaurants near and around Pattaya’s Beach Road. The Grand Solaire will be built by the highest European standards and has state-of-the-art interior design elements that include decadent marble-styled wall tiling, electronic toilet systems, black marble kitchens, customised Daikin air-conditioning systems and even unique VIP units and penthouses with private pools.
The Early bird pre-launch sales starts now.
The Start price will be 125k per sqm (pre-launch on floors 5-18 of Tower A) but additional 5,000 THB per sqm discount for early bird buyers who book now! Entry levels units are 29 sqm 1 bedrooms.

property.subtitle: Holiday Villa / Resort directly at the Lake
property.description:
This real estate project is excellent and offers luxury on 1600 sqm. The property includes a beautifully landscaped pool with lake views, 6 individual villas, 6 bedrooms with a fully furnished and beautifully decorated communal lounge. In December 2018 the property was completely renovated, there is also sufficient parking space, a communal kitchen and an additional living unit for a cleaning / housewife.
This stunning real estate project offers high levels of luxury and on the 1600 sqm. large plot of land, enough space for pure relaxation. The property can be used as a large holiday home or operated as a resort. It is located directly on a lake with lake access and offers a total of 6 individual villas, each with a bedroom, a kitchen, living room as well as air conditioning, TV and other furniture. There is also a fully furnished and beautifully decorated communal lounge. The villas have a size of 47 sqm and 72 sqm respectively. In addition, the entire project also has an underground car park and a communal kitchen, a housekeeping unit and a clubhouse which is adjacent to the large swimming pool.
Do not hesitate to look at this dreamlike object, you will love it.

property.subtitle: Stunning Condo for sale and rent at Wongamat
property.description:
This stunning and popular condo is for sale or for rent. The Condo have a living area of 105 square meters and is located in one of the higher floors of the building. Due the high floor, it allows a breathtaking view of the sea. It is fully furnished and has two bedrooms, a balcony, a kitchen including microwave and more ... The furniture is very high quality and many are imported and thus unique.
The project where the condo is located is very popular. This is partly due to the good location of the condominium and the good facilities, which include a swimming pool, a private parking, a tennis court.
Interested in viewing this nice condo ? Contact us!

property.subtitle: House 3 bedroom for rent in Pattaya with Pool

The House is in a small village with security-service and contains also an private pool. It is only 10-15 minutes drive to centre of the city.

property.subtitle: Dreamhouse in Na Jomtien for an unbeatable price for sale.
property.description:
Dreamhouse in Na Jomtien for an unbeatable price for sale. This home is just a 10 minute drive to Nong Nooch Garden. The Nong Nooch Garden is a very popular tourist attraction with an area of ​​over 1 700 Rai, welcoming tourists from all over the world. More than 5,000 people visit the garden every day and it has also been recognized as one of the ten most beautiful gardens in the world. He is highly rated by global websites and has received numerous awards and prizes. The distance to the center of Pattaya is about 30 minutes, here you get everything from A to Z. The beautiful beach of Bang Saray is just a 10 minute drive away from this dream home.
The house has 2 floors, 3 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, a living area of ​​267 square meters, a plot of 400 square meters, a private pool and a European kitchen. The house is sold fully furnished and therefore would be ready for occupancy.
• The price of the house has recently been reduced by 5,000,000 Baht, so you should be quick before it's gone.

property.subtitle: 2in1 Condo for sale right on Beach Road
property.description:
From 2to1! This 2 bed condo has a living area of ​​59 m² + independent adjoining living unit with 34 m² with internal connecting door. This gives a total of 93 m² with 3 bedrooms. There is also another room, which can also be converted into a 4th bedroom, which is currently used as a working room. All of this is less than a minute's walk from the beach. With separate access to the two condos, you have the opportunity to rent out a unit separately or to let friends live, without them having to go through your apartment every time. This is how you preserve your privacy and independence. The apartment is not small and "box-shaped" like so many you see, but light and airy with plenty of storage space. On the ground floor of the building there are 3 very popular British, German and Norwegian restaurants with 2 laundries, 24-hour security with electronic entrance and a parking garage. Both apartments have the latest UPVC double glazing, new ceilings with moldings, fridges and freezers with microwaves, 2 fully equipped kitchens and 2 bathrooms, 3 large wall TVs, 3 air conditioning units and much more. The entire lighting has energy-saving LED lights and beautiful ceiling fans in all main rooms. The apartment is on the same floor as the swimming pool, which is very convenient for taking an early morning swim after a workout.
Price: 5.25 Mil. THB (negotiable)

It is a nice and peaceful area, not far from Mabprachan reservoir. The surrounding area contains many good restaurants and you are very close to many new golf courses in Pattaya. All this only 20-30 minutes drive away from Pattaya City. Here is the place for your family.
Facilities include: Swimming Pool, Health club, Fitness Center, Spa and Sauna, Children’s Play Ground, Horse Riding and Academy, Football field, Polo field, Tennis court Recreation and activities e.g. Paint Ball, ATV Hotel and Management Services Restaurants 24-hour security service

Directly after the beautiful infinty pool is the dreamlike and private section of the beach where you can forget the time and find relaxation. property.description:
A resort of peace & serenity located in the beautiful peninsula of Bang Bao, Koh Chang, Thailand. This resort is an incredible, magical place, created from lovers of natural beauty, comfort and service in mind. It is famous for its positioning and is a very beutiful, unspoilt resort in Koh Chang with a perfect view of both sunrise and sunset. The stunning rock walk offers stunning views with total privacy. 2013 this resorts were proudly awarded from TripAdvisor with the "Circle of Excellence" for quality of service.
The resort has a range of 15 deluxe bungalow. Every bungalow on this resort has been individually designed using the finest materials available rom ancient timber flooring, to handmade Buddha roof tiles, for comfort and service in mind. Every bungalow contains a satellite television, a DVD / CD Home Theatre, silent running air-conditions and fans, a room safe and complimentary broadband internet.
There are even two swimming pools available. The salt water pool is located on the beach front and gives unrivalled views of the stunning bay and mountains. The second pool is a fresh water plunge pool with stunning rock waterfall which is located in the heart of the jungle in a wonderful intimate setting.

property.subtitle: A newly renovated 1 bedroom condo
property.description:
This condo has been completely renovated to a high quality. The owner has changed all built-in furniture from dark wood into new high-gloss furniture. This unit looks very different from any other apartment in the project. Starting with the kitchen, which now has high-gloss cream-colored cupboards with additional drawers, as well as a new Siemens 3-burner induction hob, extractor hood, microwave, new sink and tap. New high-quality granite and sub-structure lighting. New large Mitsubishi refrigerator with 3 compartments and automatic ice machine. The refrigerator is housed in a new special cabinet including a large side cabinet.
In the dining area there is a new cabinet with an antique Japanese front. This cabinet has a deep, floor-to-ceiling storage space that is accessible through a hidden side door. It is designed in such a way that this cabinet hides an uncomfortable notch of the support column in the wall. Adjacent to the dining area is a large, new desk with a wall unit and lighting underneath. The desk has a pull-out printer shelf and hides sockets and cables. The desk granite corresponds to that of the kitchen. This work area is ideal for anyone who wants to work from home. The dining and living room areas are divided by floor-to-ceiling wooden dividers to visually separate the large room. The living room has a new 65-inch smart TV from LG with LG soundbar and a new remote-controlled ceiling fan. In the large changing room, the old, dark cupboards were removed and new custom-made cupboards in high-gloss cream were installed. The side cabinet has been given more storage space for clothes and has a hidden safe. The bathroom has a new high-gloss vanity with drawer shelves and a large, specially adapted make-up mirror with concealed upper and lower lighting. Above the toilet, the old, dark doors have been replaced by new cream-colored doors for the storage cupboard. New exhaust fan and towel rail. The bedroom has a new, custom bookcase cabinet with hidden electrical and cable management for LG's new 55-inch wall-mounted smart TV. New king-size bed and Sealy mattress. On the balcony, there is a new custom-made closet with a granite top, in which there is a laundry dryer with a large capacity. Above the cabinet, there are two matching shelves and a new socket. There is a new Samsung washing machine in the balcony storage area next to the air conditioning compressor. The large balcony also has new dining set with a marble table and two sun loungers to enjoy the wonderful sea view. New, energy-efficient ceiling lighting was installed throughout the apartment. All rooms have new wallpaper, new carpets, and redesigned windows. All furniture is new. The custom-made cupboards all have soft-close doors and drawers. The apartment is fully furnished. Everything gives a well-thought-out impression and was set up with an eye for detail. The project is 70 meters from Beach Road, close to numerous Thai and international restaurants, baht bus, and everything else you might need.

property.description: A super-luxury condo in a beachfront project is situated towards the quieter, southern end of Jomtien Beach. The living room has patio windows on two sides each having its own balcony giving wide 180 degrees panoramic view of the Jomtien landscape and views across the Gulf of Thailand. This condo comes fully furnished with an elegant design, well-equipped with high-quality furniture. The open plan living room and all bedrooms are fitted with air conditioning and the total living space of 217 square meters is beautifully decorated. The project provides full facilities include a nice communal pool, fitness, a game room with a pool table and table tennis, an on-site laundry, covered parking for car and bicycle, 24-hour security with CCTV and keycard access. Furthermore, the project is connected to Baht Bus Route, therefore you can easily reach the walking street and the city center.

property.subtitle: Stunning Beachfront Duplex-Penthouse
property.description:
This is a "must" for everyone who is really looking for something special. 270 degree panoramic view and an astonishing 310 square meters of living space spread over 2 floors in an architecturally beautiful semicircle Skyrise residential complex. The penthouse is located directly on Jomtien-Dongtan Beach in Pattaya. This upscale duplex penthouse offers a unique living experience that is unsurpassed in the entire Jomtien region. It has 270 ° panoramic views of Jomtien Beach all the way down to Bang Saray, Sattahip and Pattaya Bay.
20 meter long windows which reach from the floor to the ceiling offer a breathtaking view in a semicircle on both floors and offer a phenomenal view over the Gulf of Thailand, the skyline of Jomtien Bay and the islands on the horizon - from every room. Two large whirlpools invite you to a pleasure bath with a wonderful sea view, one on the upper floor, the other on a separate balcony on the ground floor.
The main level has an open living and dining room combined with an open kitchen with two balconies, including a family-sized whirlpool. To maximize the use of space, the guest room is equipped with a king-size fold-away bed. Thus, the open space can be converted into a unique guest room in a few seconds. There is a western style kitchen with built in appliances. All worktops made of "Blue Pearl Granite". There is a guest bathroom, a separate guest toilet and generous storage space, a separate storage room and storage space under the stairs are of course available.
The floors on both levels are made of white natural quartz and thus contribute to the elegance and luxury of this special property.
Upstairs is a spacious, open master bedroom with a raised oval king-size bed area, a TV in a retractable elevator, an office area and a large walk-in closet for him and her as well as a large mirrored make-up beauty desk. Another highlight is the large whirlpool next to the windows to enjoy the sunset in the evening.
On the back deck behind more mirrored shelves there is an outdoor laundry area.
This condominium is a trophy residence that gives the buyer the feeling of a rare quiet beach experience but in the middle of the hectic life of Jomtien Beach. There are few buildings in Thailand that are as architecturally strong as this one. This means that the resident enjoys the strength, peace and privacy that thick walls, ceilings and floors offer.
The owner has two indoor or underground parking spaces as well as access to a large pool and a garden area on the fifth floor.
To fully understand the entire experience, this property needs to be viewed twice - once a day and then again for the night lights.
The property is registered in FREEHOLD Foreign Name Ownership. If the new owner wants to redesign, the penthouse can easily have 4 bedrooms, 5 toilets and 3 showers.
For more information and to schedule a viewing, please contact us now.

property.subtitle: Huge detached house In Tranquil Land Plot
property.description: This house is perfect for families who need space, security and privacy and still want to be "close to everything". Bang Saray, a traditional picturesque fishing village, is an up-and-coming area with beautiful beaches and very easy access. 20 minutes from U-Tapao International Airport - 10 minutes to the beach - 30 minutes to Pattaya. Bang Saray's growing popularity is not only due to its excellent seafood restaurants or pristine beaches ... In the immediate vicinity of Bang Saray you will find the tropical garden Nong Nooch, the Silverlake vineyard, the Cartoon Network (soon to be reissued as Aquaverse - First Columbia Pictures Theme & Waterpark), the Swiss Shepherd Farm, Wat Yanasangwararam (temple), Wat Khao Chichan and Ramayana water park. In addition, there is a large selection of premium golf courses in the area and very easy access to the new highway to Bangkok and Map Ta Put / Rayong. Space is essential at this property - you will have plenty of it. Daylight and a fresh (sea) breeze. Designed and built for a relaxed lifestyle with indoor and outdoor entertainment areas. We estimate an interior space of approx. 550 square meters - consisting of 2 guest rooms, large living/dining areas, and 7-9 bedrooms, depending on how you want to use each room. Sufficient covered parking space for 3 cars - storage rooms, laundry, utility room and beautiful, spacious verandas to enjoy nature. This amazing property is located on an area of ​​almost 5,000 square meters outdoors and is surrounded by greenery and lush landscape.

property.subtitle: Eco-Style Studio in Bang Saray
property.description: Promotion Price! The eco-style studio measures 29 square meters of living space. The project is being built in an ideal location, just 400m from Bang Saray Beach on the east coast of Thailand. Eco-design features such as passive environmental design, energy-efficient devices, natural ventilation system, thermally efficient cladding, energy-efficient lighting, rainwater collection system. The project offers a wide range of eco-friendly design features and wellness facilities. It also offers residents a range of communal facilities and services such as the salt water infinity pool on the roof with a waterfall, a herbal steam bath, a fitness center / sauna, a health café with a communal pedestrian area and a communal area for bicycles and gardens / sky garden, yoga Pavilion. All this just an hour and a half drive from Bangkok International Airport (Suvarnabhumi), Bang Saray is a quiet fishing village on the east coast of Thailand. Bang Saray offers residents and holidaymakers an incomparable feeling of living. Known for its great seafood and pristine beaches, the area is quickly becoming a must-see place. The area is currently growing rapidly and a number of new restaurants, bars and amenities are opening up every day. There are already a number of luxury housing developments in the area, but for the most part, Bang Saray retains its old world charm.

The most perfect choice of living, complete with EXCLUSIVE LIVING functionality. Live privately with only 19 units on an area of ​​more than 5 Rai. Smart home system in the house allows you to control various systems in the house with your fingertips. Such as electric lighting, air conditioning, automatic garage door systems and specifically with electric charging systems for electric vehicles that are installed with the house. The project will lay the main power cable network below the street so that there are no power poles in front of the house. Therefore you have the scenery of the project 360 degrees around you. In each house of the project there is a swimming pool with a spa salt system that is harmless to health and does not cause allergic reactions. As far as the interior of the house is concerned, the project views the outdoors with natural light and focuses on saving energy, the double ceiling height helps make the house look airy. The total height of the hall ceiling is approx. 8 meters. The house offers peace and quiet and has the latest security standards and CCTV system around the project. In addition, the project also offers a solar cell system for the communal area to make your life, living and happiness as comfortable as possible. The property can be accessed from several directions, including Pattaya City and the new highway. You can easily reach any destination including the tourist attractions in and around Pattaya City.

property.subtitle: Modern pool villa with rooftop-terrace
property.description:
This village is a modern vacation home area in the prestigious Silver Lake area. The place is ideal for comfortable and family life at the highest level, in the city center it is only 15 minutes. This inexpensive modern, two-story pool villa consists of 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a large living room, a kitchen area, a lounge area, a roof terrace, a swimming pool and a parking lot. Each bedroom has a wardrobe and an equipped bathroom, fully furnished and designed for your comfortable living! This property has a usable area of ​​355 square meters and a plot size of 466 square meters.
The village offers the residents all day long the facilities of the project such as the sports and SPA center with café-PA salon, Finnish sauna and steam bath, 2 whirlpools and a swimming pool with a size of 25 x 10 m, fitness and CrossFit area, yoga studio, beach volleyball field, soccer field, MMA combat cage, muay thai ring, green relaxation area, leisure area such as table tennis, trampoline and bike rental.

property.subtitle: 4 Bedroom Poolvilla in Thai-Bali Style
property.description: Charming house which offers incomparable craftsmanship and exceptional amenities. The house is located in a quiet and natural village in Huai Yai, with easy access to Sukhumvit Road and all the amenities of Pattaya. Only 10 minutes by car to the beautiful beaches of Na Jomtien and Sattahip and restaurants by the sea, 20 minutes to the center of Pattaya. The wide streets of the village are lined with tropical green. You will enjoy a large communal pool and fitness room. The house offers beautiful 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms on 220 square meters of living space and 550 square meters of land. This Thai Bali inspired design is truly remarkable inside and out. The furnishings include wooden cabinets, beds, tables and wall panels. Panoramic sliding windows provide plenty of natural light. Open living room with wooden dining table and gourmet kitchen with cooking island invites you to linger. The delightful master bedroom has an en suite bathroom with bathtub, bright and fresh bathrooms in all bedrooms, plenty of storage space, a lively garden with tropical plants, a covered garage for 2 cars and absolute privacy thanks to a high fence. Your family and loved ones will enjoy the cozy garden and swimming pool, perfect for family celebrations!

property.subtitle: Charming 3 bedroom house
property.description: Tucked away on the outskirts of town, this charming three bedroom house is in a lush, green oasis. It is only 400m from a quiet little beach. The house is located on a spacious 420 m² lot in the midst of natural vegetation. Living area of ​​150 m2 and terrace area of ​​50 m2. This house, which is largely in its original condition, is presented in pristine condition and has many functions. The combination of natural light through secondary light windows, high ceilings, neutral interior and always cold marble floors, antique teak furniture fills the house with tropical charm. The central living room has a spectacular high ceiling that gives the house a feeling of grandeur. Enjoy the possibilities of a very spacious functional kitchen with stove, oven, washing machine, large fridge, dishwasher and many storage cupboards. Whether for entertainment, relaxation or a gathering of all people living in the house, outdoors is a wonderful place to enjoy the sun all year round. From the large shady terrace you can enjoy the view of the garden. If you want to move into a property in which your growing family feels at home with plenty of space and separation, then this property must be at the top of your list.

property.subtitle: Wonderful and tropical Poolvilla
property.description: Wonderful, tropical 4 bedroom poolvilla, located on Jomtien 2nd Road, Pattaya City. This beautiful property consists 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms with bathtub, a built-in and well-equipped kitchen, a private swimming pool, a parking lot and an automatic gate on a land plot of 420 square meters. The property has a usable area of 250 square meters and is completely furnished including 4 air conditioning units, and a washing machine. Nearby you will find several well-known restaurants with fresh seafood such as Poo Pen Restaurant, Lungsawai Restaurant, Sudkhet Talaypao and of course Jomtien Beach, which is reachable within walking distance.

property.subtitle: Brand new, modern villa on a huge lot

This fantastic property in resort-style consists of the main house with 4 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms and a separate guest house with 2 bedrooms and en-suite bathrooms, an underground car park, an elevator over 3 floors (Schindler German), fitness room in the basement with a separate bathroom, Housekeeping and gardening quarters, spa with sauna, steam bath, hot and cold bath and natural stone swimming pool. In addition, the villa offers an electricity generator and home automation. If you are looking for a modern home with huge lot for the whole family in the middle of nature, this spacious home should be considered. Stop dreaming and make this home yours!

property.subtitle: Guesthouse close to the beach

You will also find some bars, shops and grocery stores in the immediate vicinity.

property.subtitle: New 3 bedroom townhouse for rent
property.description: New 2-story townhouse for rent in Naklua. This beautiful townhouse is located between Sukumvit Road Soi 8 and the FN Outlet Pattaya. The house is completely furnished including 4 air conditioning systems and is therefore ready to move into. The village also offers 24-hour security and a communal pool. The property is in a fantastic location with easy access to Highway 7 and Highway No. 36. Only 10 minutes from central Pattaya. Less than 300 m from the public beach "Krating Lai" and the beach restaurants. If you are looking for somewhere close to the beach to relax, Krating Lai Beach could be the perfect beach hideaway for you.

property.subtitle: Fantastic house surrounded by a green oasis
property.description:
This beautiful house with a total of 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms is surrounded by a dreamlike, green oasis and, with its 3200 square meter plot size, offers a lot of space to feel good. You get drinking and industrial water from your own 60m deep well. The tank and pump are in the small, brown well house. The house has a European kitchen including a water filter, stove, oven, washing machine and 2 dishwashers. The entire property has an irrigation (sprinkler) system, so that only a few areas have to be watered with a garden hose. The open garage (1 parking space) is followed by a covered interior area with a width of 4m. In the closed part of the garage there are 3 rooms, used as storage and workshop, plus a toilet with shower. On the right back of the house there is a small building 570x270cm. Divided into a Thai kitchen and an equipment shed. At the covered natural pond with waterfall and stream there is a pavilion about 5x5m, where you can relax while listening to the splashing water. On the left back of the house there is a greenhouse approx. 13 x 3m, with an idyllic seat where you can sunbathe, plus a small, brick material house. The greenhouse houses a vanilla farm and around 120 orchids. On the right side of the garage, the owner is currently building a 6x6m greenhouse to grow vines (a friend, with a similar greenhouse) can harvest grapes 3 times a year.
The completion of this property was in June 2019.
Optimal location approx. 400m to the town center (fresh fruit and vegetable market and 2 supermarkets 24/7). In the opposite direction approx. 400m to a larger lake (near the temple) = local recreation area for many sports enthusiasts and those looking for exercise.
approx. 15km to downtown Chiang Rai. approx. 15km to Chiang Rai (CEI) Airport. approx. 8 km to the Immigration Office.

property.subtitle: Residential Complex with good income for sale

This property is in a good location, just 5 minutes from Terminal 21 and 7 minutes from Pattaya Beach or Wongamat Beach.
The monthly income is around 100,500 Thai Baht. The building is fully booked, with almost only annual contracts.
19 rooms a 4,500 Thai Baht 2 rooms a 7,500 Baht

property.subtitle: Luxury detached poolvilla with private mooring dock
property.description:
This immaculate waterfront pool villa is just a few minutes' walk from the beach. It is without a doubt the most exclusive property in the Village and probably one of the most exclusive properties in all of Pattaya-Jomtien. The property is completely secured by magnetic sensors and an "all-round" CCTV surveillance camera system. What distinguishes this apartment is not only the excellent quality and the overall design: It has a private dock for a US-made 26.8-foot Chris Craft speedboat with a MerCruiser® 350 Magnum (300 hp) engine. You can classify a Chris Craft ship as a "Bentley" among boats. The boat name is: "Knot for Sail". But that's not all: For easy entry there is a hydraulic walkway, which was designed and installed for comfortable boarding of the passengers. What else is on offer now? This dream home is surrounded by 1,312 square meters of well-kept garden. The main building houses a spacious living / dining area with an adjoining entertainment lounge. An open kitchen with high-quality kitchen appliances and fittings, including a premium wine fridge, dishwasher, microwave, oven, American fridge with ice cube dispenser and all the kitchen utensils you need. A preparatory kitchen is connected to this beautiful kitchen - fully equipped, currently this is mainly used as a laundry room with SIEMENS washing machine and separate tumble dryer. The preparation kitchen is easily accessible from the garage as well as via a separate service entrance. The master bedroom is also on the ground floor with a walk-in closet (plus electronic safe) and a spacious bathroom, his and hers washbasins; Rain shower and duo whirlpool, fully air-conditioned and integrated JBL sound system. Door and window fittings are made of PVC, double glazed for maximum comfort. All air conditioners are Daikin ceiling cassettes. The master bedroom, living / dining room and entertainment / office room all have beautiful views and direct access to the garden / swimming pool area. The freestyle pool with jacuzzi for 8 people is fantastic! A real entertainment area with a garden dome and terrace - perfectly geared towards the most exclusive parties ... A professional JBL sound system, light system (LED - moving heads - laser) and special effects (bubble machines and smoke streamer) transform the garden / pool area completely into a super trendy pool party. On the second floor of this dream home there are 3 bedrooms with private bathrooms. Each bedroom is fully furnished and is currently hardly used: everything is as good as new. The garage is large and offers plenty of storage space. The garage leads into the maids quarters with bedroom and bathroom and direct access to the preparatory kitchen. A power generator, a water purification system and an additional washing machine are also housed in the garage. 1 car fits in the garage. Additional parking spaces are available on the premises for a further 2 cars. The villa has recently been expanded: a 70 square meter, fully equipped and air-conditioned training center / fitness studio on the jetty. A great way to stay in shape without leaving your home! What you see is what you get! This stunning villa is fully furnished including all works of art, original paintings and exclusive decorative items. Around 600+ square meters of usable space and a pool like no other. The Chris Craft speedboat is included as well as an almost brand new Yamaha jet ski.
The location of this immaculate villa is conveniently located near the new freeway entrance (Ocean Marina) of the extended freeway No. 7 in the direction of Bangkok and Rayong. It is a short 10-minute drive from Pattaya. Nestled within walking distance to the beach near trendy spots like Alexa Beach Club (formerly Cafe Del Mar); Bacco Beach, The Glasshouse, Tahiti Beach Club, Tutu Beach, View Mare and The CAVE, while locals would likely come to drifters on the beach every now and then.

We recommend this magnificent property both as an investment property and as a private villa.

In the vicinity you will find many retail stores such as supermarkets, fresh markets and other shopping opportunities.

property.subtitle: Modern style Poolvilla with 3 Bedroom
property.description: Very nice and modern house in Soi Siam Country Club on the east-side of Pattaya. The property contains 3 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, private swimming pool and is located in a great village area. Additional you will have acces to the communal swimming pool of the village. The village has a security-guard and is close to the main road where you can find many restaurants and groceries shops.

property.subtitle: Land near Phoenix Golf Course
property.description: Very nice plot of land with 136 square wah or 544 square meters, close to the Phoenix golf course for sale. Everything is ready to build a beautiful house. The property is surrounded by quiet and green surroundings. You can drive to Na-Jomtien Beach in just 10-15 minutes.

property.subtitle: Beachfront Condo in the city center
property.description: This modern and big condo is located in the city center of Pattaya. Enjoy a lot of space, modern furnishings and sea views from the associated balcony. The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, a storage room, a modern European kitchen, a washing machine and a large 55 inch TV. The apartment is fully furnished and can be moved into directly. Live modern and surrounded by everything you need to live.

property.subtitle: Modern 1-Bedroom Condo
property.description: This modern condo has 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom. Offers a useable area of 25 sqm. The condo is fully furnished and near a public road, 5 minutes far from Jomtien Beach. The project has good facilities, a huge communal pool and security service.

property.subtitle: Superb located landplot for sale
property.description: This landplot provides a superb location as it is close to the highway wich leads you to Pattaya or Bangkok but it is still far enough away to hear no noise. In the surrounding area you can find many shops, a market with fresh fruits and of course many local as well as international restaurants. Enjoy the quiet area but still be close to the city center of Pattaya or in the other direction to Maprachan Lake.

property.subtitle: Great sea facing condo for sale
property.description: Great corner unit with sea view on Pratamnak for sale. The condo is on one of the upper floors, so you often do not need air conditioning, as you can use the pleasant breeze of air that blows through the living room when the sliding doors are open. Get a fantastic view from every room of this beautiful 1 bedroom apartment. The apartment will be sold unfurnished but already has a built-in kitchen, a refrigerator and, if necessary, a microwave must be added.

property.subtitle: New and luxury House for Sale
property.description: Brand new home for sale or rent. This house is located in Huay Yai in a very beautiful and luxurious village. From here you can reach Highway 7 in a few minutes' drive and have easy access to Sukhumvit Road. The house is fully furnished and can therefore be moved into immediately. The equipment includes a new washing machine, a covered parking lot, a garden and a great interior. You can access the village with a key card.

property.subtitle: Hotel in Chiang Mai for Sale
property.description: Beautiful and good located Resort for sale in Mae-Rim, Chiang Mai. The Resort contains 9 Bungalows in total and 1 Reception building where all are surrounded by rice fields, this gives a very peaceful, relaxed and beautiful atmosphere. The whole Resort is build on a 7 Rai and 60 square wah big land plot which provides enough space in case somebody would like to extend the Resort with more Bungalows or Facilities. The Resort is located just 20-30 minutes away from the town and is therefore very convinient located. Perfect for customers who love and enjoy to stay in the nature. The project will be sold including hotel license.

property.subtitle: House Near Phoenix Golf Couse Pattya
property.description: House with a land plot of 1236 square meters for sale. The property consists of a house with 3 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms, 1 dressing room, a kitchen, a living room, storage room and a large parking space for up to 6 cars. The total living area is 385 square meters and it is about 10-15 minutes drive away from the beach in Bang Saray.

property.subtitle: 4 Bedroom Poolvilla near Maprachan Lake
property.description: This nice Poolvilla with 4 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms is located in a private and very peaceful village close to Maprachan Lake. The property provides modern design and a big swimming pool. The roof is insulated with foam and all windows and the terrace doors are uPVC and with tinted glass. The villa is partially furnished and contains of 7 air-condition in total. The European Kitchen contains his own storage room and provides enough place to cook his favourite dishes. All located in a very convenient location and only around 10 minutes away from the motorway and International School. • The landplot next to the advertised Villa belongs to the same owner and can be bought for only 3 Mil. Thai Baht. Therefore the buyer have the possibility to extend the land plot of additional 688 square meter.

property.subtitle: Pool villa close to the beach for rent
property.description: Very nice and fully furnished pool villa for rent. This beautiful villa consists of 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, is just 5 minutes from the beach in Na-Jomtien and is therefore very well located. The center of Pattaya is just a 15-minute drive from the villa. There are many good local and international restaurants in the vicinity. Live in a quiet, relaxed place and still be close to Pattaya's city center.

property.subtitle: 1 Bedroom Condo with pool view
property.description: Nice condo with 1 separate bedroom and 1 bathroom. The comfortable unit comes fully furnished and provides a balcony with a nice pool view. The project is located in Jomtien and contains off excellent facilities such as parking lots, 24-hour security service, CCTV, swimming pool and a gym. Only around 1km away from the beach and very close to local grocery stores and a market.

property.subtitle: Modern Hotel with 12 Bedroom for sale
property.description: Business hotel for sale at Koh Samui. The 2 storey building delivers a modern and fresh design and contains of a big swimming pool. Located in a quite area and only 300 m distance to the sea. Close by a fishing village, shopping center - 1 km, convenient transportation - 9 km to Koh Samui International Airport. - All Rooms are fully furnished and providing a bathroom. - 9 studio apartments with 32 sqm - 3 family apartments with 50-75 sqm - Balcony with Pool View - Reception - Parking area

property.subtitle: Luxury Hotel with 319 Rooms for sale
property.description: Luxury hotel with a total of 319 hotel rooms for sale. The hotel is located on the famous Pratamnak Hill in Pattaya and is on a 6 Rai and 2 Ngan land plot. This beautiful hotel is just 200m from the beach and is therefore perfectly located to receive guests who are planning a beach vacation. Pratamnak is developing rapidly and there are more and more new and great restaurants, saunas, massage salons, cafes and much more.

property.subtitle: 5-Star Luxury Condotel for sale in Phuket
property.description:
Superb and luxury Condotel Project for sale in Phuket. This project is a mix between Hotel and Condominium, which means a part of the project can be bought where the other part is used hot hotel guests. The project delivers high quality standard directly in the area of Kamala in Phuket.
- Number of 1-Bedroom apartments; 48 - Size of 1-Bedroom apartment; 35 square metre - Number of 2-Bedroom apartments; 6 - Size of 2-Bedroom apartment; 70 square meter - All apartments are fully furnished - 54 parking lots - Hotel license

property.subtitle: 4-Star Hotel in prime location for sale
property.description: Hotel for sale with a total of 226 hotel rooms. The hotel is located in the heart of the vibrant city of Pattaya. The hotel is located on a plot of 3512 m² and of course has a swimming pool, a restaurant with outdoor and indoor seating and many other facilities such as a gym with pool view. It is just 500 meters to the beach. The hotel has had a very good recession on all major booking portals.

property.subtitle: Business Hotel in the city center for sale
property.description: Business Hotel in central Pattaya for sale. This 4-star boutique Hotel contains of 35 superior rooms and 42 executive rooms with balconies. The hotel is just 10 minutes from the beach away and in the surrounding area of many shops and restaurants. The hotel comes with a wide range of facilities such as a fitness and swimming pool.

property.subtitle: House for rent with 2 Bedroom at Siam country club
property.description: 1-storey house with 2 Bedroom and 2 Bathroom, located in East Pattay; very close to the well-known Soi Siam Country Club and the Highway 7 which leads you to the city centre or Bangkok. The house comes fully furnished and contains a kitchen, 1 bathroom has a bathtub, a walk-in wardrobe and a working space. Around the house you will have 2 sitting areas which let you relax and enjoy the peaceful area. The village is well maintained and close to restaurants, gorcoerie stores, a fresh food market and the area of Maprachan Lake.

property.subtitle: House for rent in Soi Siam Country Club
property.description: Nice 3 bedroom / 3 bathroom house for rent in East-Pattaya. The property is located in a village area and provides security-service and a nice communal swimming pool. Very close to the well-known Soi Siam Country Club Road and just a few minutes drive away from Maprachan lake. You can reach the city centre of Pattaya in around 10 minutes by car. Easy access to highway No. 7 which leads you to Bangkok. In the surrounding area you have many local as well as international restaurants and shopping opportunities.

property.subtitle: House for sale & rent Siam Country Club
property.description: Nice 2-storey house in a very popular village. This nice house provides 3 bedroom, 4 bathroom and comes fully furnished. The house delivers plently living space on a 400 square metre land plot. The village where this house is located is good maintained and provides a 24-hour sercurity-service, a nice communal swimming pool and a kid's playground area; therefore it is very popular for family's with children. The location is quiet but still not too far away from the city centre which you can reach in about 10 - 15 minutes driveway. In opposite direction you can reach Maprachan Lake which provides more and more activies such as driving bicycle, enjoying coffee in one of the many coffee shops or great dining in a local or international restaurant. You will have easy access to Highway 7 which leads you Bangkok as well.

property.subtitle: Modern style Poolvilla with 2 bedroom
property.description: Beautifully designed, modern style villa with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a total area of 136 square meters and around the house. The land plot provides a green area and nice, decorative trees. Inside the house you will has a European kitchen area for cooking, a living room, a private swimming pool, 24 hour security-system and a seating area. The villa comes fully furnished and ready to move-in. The village is located in the Jomtien area and only minutes away from the beach. The atmosphere of the village is very peaceful and quiet, therefore the property is suitable for living a relaxing life.Nearby are many shops, grocery stores. Just a few minutes away from the well-known Rompho Market, Rattanakorn Market, Foodmart and Tesco Lotus.

property.subtitle: Poolvilla with 2 bedroom for rent
property.description: Modern 1-storey pool villa with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The house has a great roof terrace with a view of the sky and the village. The villa has a fully equipped kitchen, living room, private swimming pool with seating area to relax and enjoy the garden atmosphere. The house is located in a quiet and peaceful village and is therefore suitable for a relaxed life at home. The property is close to public transport that will take you to either Jomtien Beach or the center of Pattaya in just a few minutes. There are local grocery stores nearby and other shopping opportunities can be reached in a few minutes; such as Rompho Market, Rattanakorn Market, Foodmart and Tesco Lotus.

property.subtitle: Prestige Designer Duplex-Penthouse
property.description: The only designer penthouse of its kind. You won't find this kind of design and art in any other penthouse in Pattaya. High quality designer furnishings, no matter what room you are in in this penthouse, no matter whether it is chairs, tiles, walls or decoration, nothing has been left to chance here. Beautiful high ceilings and a lot of space to feel good. Enjoy sunsets day after day while you drink a glass of wine on the balcony and look at the sea. The living room, high-quality kitchen, guest bathroom and balcony are located on the lower floor of the apartment, while the bedroom and bathroom are located in the upper part of the penthouse. • The registered living area is 170 square meters, but there are now approx. 240 square meters available due to the renovation work.

property.subtitle: Dreamlike Duplex-Penthouse
property.description: This dreamlike penthouse in Jomtien is in excellent condition and impresses with its high quality. The furnishings are perfectly matched to the double-storey penthouse and the result is a harmonious and beautiful concept. The corner unit has enough space to feel at home. In the lower area of the apartment is the large and airy living area including a European kitchen and a large table to enjoy the evening with friends. In the upper part of the apartment there is a work area, bedroom and bathroom. The penthouse is being sold fully furnished and ready to move into. • The registered living area is 170 square meters, but there are now approx. 240 square meters available due to the renovation work.

property.subtitle: Luxury Residence with 6 Bedroom
property.description:
This luxury Poolvilla is located in East-Pattaya in great maintained and peaceful Village. The property provides plenty living space and contains of a huge roof terrace which can be also converted into more bedrooms. Everything is in mint condition and the owner will provide some further improvements currently such as adding some fringe palms along the back wall. The swimming pool contains already a large external bar area where you can enjoy your time with friends or family.
The house was rented pre-COVID to the last tenant at 130,000 THB a month for 3 years.
If this house was on Siam Royal View the value would be 28-30 Million THB. We think it's a great chance to purchase a sizeable family home on a well managed estate at a price with upside potential

property.subtitle: 1 Bedroom Condo with investment option
property.description:
Pre-launch Promotion offer until 15/08/2021.
Beautiful condos in brand new project available. This condo project is located in Patong, Phuket and it is scheduled for completion in December 2023. It has 114 units across 8 floors. The condominium will match your dreams and worth the investment in every square inch. The project provides a lot of facilities, whether a sky pool, a fitness center and a view point lounge deck which allows you to see the stunning sea view.
Investment Benefits: - 7% guarantee rental return for 15 years - Receive new lease negotiation conditions after 15 years - You will not have to pay monthly fees, electricity costs, maintenance, and sinking funds. - The owners can possibly stay at the unit for 4 weeks: 2 weeks in low-season and 2 weeks in high-season. Free electricity, water, and monthly costs. - Free shuttle bus service to the beach and discounts on accommodation, spa, and restaurant.

property.subtitle: Luxurious House with 3 Bedroom and private pool
property.description: Luxury house with 3 bedroom 2 bathroom and parking space for 2 cars. The property will be sold unfurnished and contains of 1 storey. This detached house is in a luxurious village located in the Huay Yai area. The property provides a built-in kitchen, a nice private swimming pool, a nice garden, a installed underground water storage tank and a water pump system. All bathrooms have installed water heater. From here you can reach Highway 7 in a few minutes' drive and you have easy access to Sukhumvit Road. The village can be entered by a key card and contains security-service.

property.subtitle: Modern house with 3 bedroom and private pool
property.description: Simply a beautiful and modern contemporary style house with 1 storey, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. This Poolvilla has plenty living space, a working space, a fully equipped kitchen and a private swimming pool with seating area for a relax atmosphere. The land plot has 790 square mater and provides a green area whith nice and decorative trees. The villa comes fully furnished and is ready to move-in. The village can be accessed with a key card, the house is separately secured with a automatic gate.

property.subtitle: Brand new luxury house with a great garden for sale
property.description: New House with 3 bedroom and 2 bathroom for sale. The property is built on a 414 sqm. sized land plot and provides a living space of 190 sqm. The house contains of a parking space for 2 cars, a nice dining area, a fully equipped European kitchen and a great and green garden area. The luxurious village where the house is located is in the Huay Yai area and makes it easy to access the Highway No. 7 as well as the Sukhumvit Road. The village can be accessed with a key card and provides security-service.

property.subtitle: New renovated beachfront Condo
property.description: Fabulous condo which just been renovated into a modern design. The condo contains of 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom and is located in a beachfront project. Feel home on a total living area of 96 square meter and Enjoy the nice and fresh air of the ocean while enjoying the awesome sunsets on the large sea view balcony which is rare to find these days. The Condominium offers a good range of facilities such as, 2 swimming pools, a tennis court, a gym, a table tennis room and a covered parking place. The location of this project is very convenient and close to all amenities.
