property.subtitle: Seaview condo with 2 bedroom
property.description: The condo contains of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and is in a beachfront project which provides easy access to Naklua beach; only 100 meters by walking. The room is on the 30th floor and contains of a light and airy living room. The large balcony can be entered from the living room invites you to relax and enjoy the atmosphere of the ocean. Fully furnished and ready to move in.

property.subtitle: 1 bedroom Condo for sale
property.description: Spacious condo with a living area of 64 square meters, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, a built-in kitchen, a dining area and a balcony with city view. The condo is fully furnished and ready to move in. The project is located in central Pattaya, close to many shops such as Big C Extra, Central Festival, Foodland and much more. Is conveniently located, about 5-10 minutes drive to Pattaya beach. The project contains of a parking area, key card access and CCTV.

property.subtitle: Lovely and modern House with private pool
property.description: Lovely and modern house with 3 bedrooms / 2 bathrooms and a parking space for 2 cars. The property will be sold unfurnished and contains of 1 storey. This lovely house is in a peaceful village located in the Huay Yai area, and has a nice private swimming pool with a measurement of 3m x 7.5m. The land plot is 485 sqm. with a nice garden area. The village has a 24 hours security-service and is just 3 kilometers from Sukhumvit away.

property.subtitle: Thai oriental house 4 Bedrooms for sale
property.description: The beautiful Thai oriental style house is contain with 4 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms and housekeeping room 1 bedroom, 1bathroom, this luxurious Thai Bali village is close to the well-known Jomtien beach and contains a friendly atmosphere, very privately. The property is built on a 740 sqm. sized land plot and provides a living space of 530 sqm. The house contains of 1 large living room, a home theater, dining area, built-in kitchen, 3 storeroom, a parking space for 2 cars, beautiful carp pond, a installed underground water storage tank and private swimming pool it to feel relaxed. The village can be entered by a key card and contains security-service.

property.subtitle: Modern and luxury condo with a lot of space
property.description: This luxury condo contains of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms on a living size of 92 sqm. over 2 storeys. The large balcony can be entered from the living room and invites you to relax. Enjoy the atmosphere of the ocean and the view of the "Sanctuary of truth". The second floor has 1 balcony combined with Thai-Style bedroom The condo is located in a beachfront project which provides easy access to Naklua beach; only 50 meters by walking. The room is on the 7th floor and contains modern decoration is fully furnished and ready to move in. The Condominium offers a good range of facilities such as, a big swimming pool, a tennis court, a gym, a sauna room, kids playground, a covered parking place and provides 24-hour security-service.

property.subtitle: Modern sea view studio for sale or rent
property.description: Modern and fully furnsihed studio where the living room is combined with a dining kitchen including air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a sofa bed for additional guests. The kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator, stove, microwave and basic equipment for cooking and eating. The bedroom offers a breathtaking sea view up to the island of Koh Larn. The modern bathroom has a rain shower with hot water and the corresponding balcony has a table and chairs with a wonderful sea view over the bay of Pattaya and the islands. The project is located directly on Wongamat Beach. The luxurious high-rise has the highest pool on the roof in Thailand and offers a panoramic view of the sea. This project offers true 5-star luxury service and the modern tower is packed with facilities. Fitness center with a view of the "Truth of Sanctury", large playroom with air hockey, pool, table tennis and table football. You also have access to a large TV and a business lounge as well as several relaxation areas with sun loungers. Free wifi internet is available everywhere. The project is surrounded by exclusive international and local Thai restaurants and several convenience stores. A 15-minute taxi ride will bring you to downtown Pattaya with all of its attractions and shopping malls. Many other attractions are also nearby. You won't find a better place in North Pattaya!

property.subtitle: Modern house with private swimming pool
property.description: Modern house with 3 bedrooms / 2 bathrooms and a parking space for 2 cars. The property will be sold unfurnished and contains of 1 storey. This modern house is in a peaceful village located in the Huay Yai area, and has a nice private swimming pool with a measurement of 3m x 7.5m. The land plot is 523 sqm. with a nice garden area. The village has a 24 hours security-service and is just 3 kilometers from Sukhumvit away.

property.subtitle: Studio in a great area for sale
property.description: This lovely 33 sqm. studio comes fully furnished, the kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator, a stove and microwave. The Condominium offers a good range of facilities such as, 2 large swimming pools and a gym. The project is surrounded of trees which gives you a nice and fresh atmosphere. Good location, close by Big buddha temple; 5 minute drive by car and 500 meter to Thappraya road.

property.subtitle: Beachfront studio for sale
property.description:
Great studio corner unit which comes with a useable area of 33 square meters and located in a beachfront project which provides easy access to Naklua beach; only a few minute by walking. The light and airy living room is on the 24th floo. The balcony can be entered from the room invites you to relax and enjoy the atmosphere of the ocean. Fully furnished and ready to move in. Facilities:
- Large multi-level infinity pools with jacuzzi - Extensive fitness Centre and clubhouse - Resort-style open lobby - Roof terrace sun lounge area - Children's play area - Multiple games of snooker and tennis tables

property.subtitle: Studio in the city center
property.description: Lovely and fully furnished studio in a modern style with a living area of 25 square meters. The studio is located on the 1st floor of the building and offers a lovely balcony with a view of the garden . The project provides a nice communal large swimming pool, fitness, sauna, parking area, kids playground, 24-hour service security, CCTV and is very good located. Close to to shopping-malls, bars and restaurants.

property.subtitle: Condo with pool view in the city
property.description: The condo contains of 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and is fully furnished in a modern style with a living area of 35 square meters. This apartment is located on the 6th floor of the building and offers a nice balcony with a view of the swimming pool. The project provides a nice communal large swimming pool, fitness, sauna, parking area, kids playground, 24-hour service security, CCTV and is very good located. Close to to shopping-malls, bars and restaurants .

property.subtitle: Stunning house on the beach with 4 bedrooms
property.description: The luxury house has 4 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms and parking for 2 cars. The property is being sold unfurnished and has 2 floors with high quality equipment. This detached house is located right on Jomtien Beach, just a few minutes' walk from the beach. The house offers a built-in European kitchen, a dining area, a beautiful private swimming pool with a waterfall and a fantastic sea view from the whirlpool, which invites you to relax.

property.subtitle: Beachfront house with private pool
property.description: The beautiful house is located in a beach project in Na-Jomtien and has 4 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms. The property is fully furnished and offers a large balcony and a private swimming pool with seating area for a relaxed atmosphere. The property has 588 square meters and offers a green area with beautiful and decorative trees, only a few minutes' walk from the beach. Very close to many fish restaurants and many tourist areas. The village project has facilities such as a clubhouse by the sea with a 35 meter long infinity edge swimming pool, whirlpool, sauna, fitness and barbecue area by the sea. In addition, the project has a 24 hour security service and CCTV around the village.

property.subtitle: Detached house with 3 bedrooms and nice garden
property.description: Simply a beautiful house with 2 floors which contains 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and parking for 2 cars. The property is fully furnished, has a nice dining area and offers a green area with beautiful and decorative trees in a secure village in one of the most popular areas in East Pattaya. A single-family house in a comfortable area which is ready to move into.

property.subtitle: Tropical resort with private pool for sale
property.description: This resort is an incredible place on 1,360 square meters of land created for lovers of natural beauty, comfort and service. There is a swimming pool, which is located in the heart of the resort, surrounded by 6 rooms, each room having a nice seating area where you can enjoy the atmosphere of nature in the resort. The resort has a total of 9 deluxe rooms and each room at this resort has been individually designed. The main building has a very comfortably furnished lobby that serves as a reception area, but which can also be used as a large living room. It consists of 2 floors and on the upper floor there are 3 service rooms which offer a fantastic view from the seating area on the balcony, the resort provides a parking space for the customer, wide and comfortable.

property.subtitle: House with 7 Bedroom and private pool
property.description: The property consists of 5 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms on 2 floors with a plot size of 660 sqm. The house has a large private swimming pool with a size of 4.5mx 11m. and is surrounded by a beautiful green garden. This house has a large living room with kitchen in modern style and a large dining table, a whirlpool, a parking space and is completely furnished. The property designed for your comfortable living is located in Na Jomtien and is only a few minutes' walk from the beach.

property.subtitle: Beachfront 2 bedroom condo in Pranburi
property.description: A very peaceful beachfront condominium project designed to give you a great lifestyle. The apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, on the 4th floor with only one adjacent neighbor. Fully furnished by a professional designer. All rooms have air conditioning. The balcony in the is approx. 20 m² and has 2 folding chairs and a coffee table from which you can see the beautiful sea. The residential complex offers a small garden on the first floor with facilities such as a swimming pool by the sea with a small café, concierge service, security with CCTV, WIFI, parking, fitness, elevator, free bicycles for use around the area yu explore. You can access the complex with a key card.

property.subtitle: Magnificent and stunning beach house
property.description: This magnificent and modern beach house has 7 bedrooms, 8 bathrooms over 2 floors and on a plot of a total of 1512 square meters. The property is located in the beach area of Na Jomtien and is directly on the beach, completely furnished with modern furniture of the highest quality. The facilities include a beautiful, large and luxurious fitted kitchen with dining area. The house offers a huge living room in which you can relax with family and friends as well as a large private pool and a beautiful terrace. This property offers everything you dream of.

property.subtitle: Condo with 1 Bedroom and city view
property.description: 1 bedroom condominium with 86 sqm. in a popular project. This apartment is fully furnished and is located on the 5th floor of the project. It offers a large balcony with a view of the city and has sliding doors. This one bedroom unit is located in one of the most popular buildings in Jomtien which has 24 hour security and a communal pool.

property.subtitle: Condo with great city view
property.description: The Condo with 74 sqm. is in good location project which comes with full furnishings. This condo is suited on the 14th floor and provides a decent sized balcony with Pattaya city view, living room connected with kitchen and dining area. This 1-bedroom unit is in one of Jomtien's most popular buildings which is has a 24-hour security, large communal swimming pools, reception area, cleaning service, restaurants, mini-mart, and laundry service.

property.subtitle: Luxury and modern 3 storey house for sale
property.description: Luxurious and modern house with 6 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms and 3 floors. This property has a usable area of 480 m² and a plot size of 450 m². The house offers a beautiful private swimming pool, parking for 2 cars and is tastefully decorated. The spacious living room is the perfect place to relax for all family members as well as friends. The house is completely furnished and has a fitted kitchen and a nice dining area. The house is secured separately with an automatic gate and high quality windows.

property.subtitle: Splendid house 5 Bedroom with private pool
property.description: Very nice and modern house with 5 bedrooms / 6 bathrooms / 3 floors on a 548 sqm lot. The house has a large private swimming pool with the dimensions 4m x 10m. and is surrounded by nice seating. This modern and luxurious property consists of a large living room, a fitted kitchen and a large dining table, a whirlpool, a terrace on the second floor, a parking space and is completely furnished. The property designed for your comfortable living is located in Na Jomtien.

property.subtitle: Land for sale with easy access to highway
property.description: This land is very peaceful located and contains of 4 Rai 3 Ngan (6,880 sqm). The asking price per rai is 3,000,000 Thai Baht. The unique tropical estate is ideal for an upscale residential, villa or resort and provides with easy and quick access to Highway No. 7, just about 20 drive to the center of Pattaya.

property.subtitle: Beautiful House close to the sea
property.description: This beautiful property is located in a village near the sea and has 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms on a plot of 300 sqm. Wonderfully furnished in a modern and vintage style, fully furnished, built-in kitchen and a terrace on the second floor invite you to relax and enjoy the atmosphere. The house is surrounded by greenery so that you can draw fresh air from nature. No pets allowed.

property.subtitle: Exclusive and super luxurious property
property.description:
This property offers you luxury of the superlative, starting with the very modern style over the 10 bedrooms up to imported furniture which you will only see once.
The luxurious property has 1200 square meters. Living space + a 600 sqm. Roof terrace. All of this on a plot of 1256 square meters. which by no means looks small. Ground floor: On the ground floor of the apartment you will find the garage which offers space for 4 cars, the probably largest fitness gym which was built in a house of this type, the meeting room with Bugatti furniture and bathroom as well as a storage room, a laundry room, a separate apartment including kitchen, several Bedrooms and access to the garden area.
1st floor: You can reach this floor using the in-house elevator or the stairs in the hallway. This floor offers you a living room with 250 sqm., A huge granite table and Bugatti chairs, a sofa lounge with Bugatti sofas and a kitchen with 2 fridges, teppanyaki hob and everything else you need to cook. Of course, the cool wine room should not be missing in such a property. From the living room you have access to the terrace with another dining area, the private swimming pool and a cozy lounge. To the right of the swimming pool is the Versace bedroom again including a large bathroom with Jacuzzi bathtub. Further bedrooms can be found on the same floor in the rear area of ​​the property.

property.subtitle: Modern Studio condo in prime location
property.description: Studio with 35 sqm. living space and a great and modern decoration. The unit comes completely furnished with everything you need to live, including a built-in kitchen and dining table. The project in which this great studio is located is in the center of Pattaya, this makes it an excellent starting point. Everything is just around the corner, so you can walk to supermarkets, shopping centers, restaurants, pubs, massage parlors and much more.

property.subtitle: Exclusive Villa with 4 Bedrooms with best city view
property.description:
This exclusive villa is located in one of the most beautiful villa projects in Pattaya's residential area with views of the city and the mountains. The property has a plot of 764 square meters and offers 4 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms, a wonderful living area, a spacious private infinity pool where you can relax and enjoy the ambience with views over the city to the sea. The villa is fully equipped with stylish and high quality furniture. In addition, there is a beautiful green garden and a separate guest apartment on the ground floor of the villa.
The best village in Pattaya has 24 hour security and everything you need is close at hand; Banks, restaurants, shopping mall, 5 minutes drive from Sukhumvit Road and 10 minutes drive from Highway 7.

property.subtitle: 2 Bedrooms condo with modern style
property.description: The beautiful condo contains of 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with 108 sqm of living area. Fully furnished, 2 balconies, western kitchen with high-end appliances and dinning table, king size bed, bathrooms with rain shower and nice large balcony. Located in a convenient place, just 50 meters away from the beach, minutes walk to the Shopping Mall and fine dining. Condo offer secure covered parking, receptionist and 24 hour security.

property.subtitle: Land for sale in the city center
property.description: This plot offers 5 single-storey rooms and a plot of 396 sqm. The land lies in a small street and is immediately surrounded by all the amenities you need to live, such as; the famous fresh market "Rattanakon", Lotus and the Theppasit night market. Easy access to Sukhumvit Road and only a 2km drive to the beach.

property.subtitle: Modern style house with a great atmosphere
property.description: This impeccable and modern house has 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms and is built to the highest European standards, double glazed and furnished with stylish and comfortable imported furniture. The luxurious Thai Bali Village in which this property is located is close to the famous Jomtien Beach and offers a friendly atmosphere; very private. The villa is built on a 285 sqm plot and offers a living area of 235 sqm. The house consists of 1 large living room with a huge sofa, dining area, fitted kitchen and communal pool. The village can be entered with a key card and has a security service.

property.subtitle: Luxury house in the heart of the city
property.description: This luxury house with 4 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms spread over two floors is located between the center and south of Pattaya. The house has a large living room which is connected to the kitchen and dining area. In addition, the property also has an outdoor kitchen in Thai style, a walk-in closet, a private swimming pool including a garden area and an electric entrance gate as well as a living room on the second floor. The house is sold fully furnished.

property.subtitle: Spacious sea view corner unit
property.description: The 86 square meter corner unit condo is in a convenient location and comes fully furnished. This apartment is on the 15th floor and has a balcony with sea view, a living room that is connected to the kitchen and a dining area. The apartment offers 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, as well as 24-hour security, community swimming pool, a reception area, cleaning services, restaurants, a mini-mart, and a laundry service.

property.subtitle: Elegant Villa with a fantastic view of the city
property.description:
This magnificent villa in Pattaya is located in one of the most spectacular villa developments in Pattaya and offers a breathtaking view over the city to the sea. The property is fully equipped with stylish and high quality furniture.
The modern villa has 1880 square meters of living space, a super large, open living room area, an infinity private pool with 140 square meters. and spacious seating area where you can relax and enjoy the ambience with a view of the city. The house has 5 bedrooms and 1 maids room, 6 bathrooms and 2 guest bathrooms, 2 fitted kitchens in European style and 2 kitchens in Thai style. On the ground floor as well as on the first floor there is a pantry kitchen including a dining elevator, this is perfect for parties where a catering service is responsible for the well-being of the guests.
There is also an entertainment area on the ground floor that you can use for a party. The room was built in such a way that it can easily be renovated to include additional rooms. The spa area includes a sauna, a steam bath and a beautiful whirlpool. The garage offers space for 4 cars and has 2 electric roller doors. The first floor can be reached via the in-house elevator. Of course, the village has a 24-hour security service and you will find everything you need for life in the surrounding area, such as; Banks, restaurants, shopping mall, 5 minutes drive from Sukhumvit Road and 10 minutes drive from Highway 7.

property.subtitle: House with 2 Bedrooms and private pool
property.description: House with 2 bedrooms / 2 bathrooms and private swimming pool in a great village for sale. The house is located in a well-maintained village close to Highway No. 7. This provides easy as fast access to the city center. In the surrounding area you will find many nice restaurants, gocery stores, 7/11 and much more. Furthermore, you can reach the area of Maprachan Lake as well as Soi Siam Country Club within a few minutes driving. The village itself provides a small and nice community of neighboors, and 24/7 Security-Service.

property.subtitle: Modern house with private pool
property.description:
This modern house has 5 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms spread over 2 floors. The property has a living area of 297 square meters and is modern, with high quality furniture.
This house is unique in this village because the owner, in cooperation with the developer, was allowed to redesign the entire property as desired.
The house has a large dining table and an open living room that is connected to the kitchen and laundry room. The highlight of the house is the private outdoor pool with seating under a sun sail. The village is located in a quiet environment and a relaxed family atmosphere.

property.subtitle: Spacious condo 1 bedroom with Seaview
property.description: The 108 sqm. condo is on the 7th floor and has a large balcony with sea view. This apartment is fully furnished and has a large living area with dining table, a fitted kitchen, a communal pool and a fitness center. This one bedroom apartment is located in a well known area close to many restaurants, Big Buddha Hill Temple and Pattaya Bali Hai Bay.

property.subtitle: Amazing and modern style Poolvilla
property.description: This fantastic pool villa is located in a luxury residential project in the sought-after location of Pratumnak Hill, between Pattaya and Jomtien. The luxurious residential project is the only residential complex in Pattaya with private access to the beach exclusively for its residents. The property offers 6 large bedrooms and 6 luxury bathrooms, 2 jacuzzis and an excellent European fitted kitchen, a spacious open dining area that leads to a shaded outdoor entertainment area and a lovely private pool. The property also has a separate office with kitchen, a wraparound balcony on the upper floor and a private jacuzzi with sea views from the balcony to the master bedroom. The upper part of this property can be entered separately via the secured carport, which makes it ideal for visiting guests / family or friends. Ideal for renting as 2 large units.

property.subtitle: Stunning studio condo with Golf Course View
property.description: This studio with views of the golf course and partial sea view is located on the 5th floor and is 30.15 m². Living room. Fully furnished and built-in kitchen. The project is located just 200 meters from the famous Pratamnak beach. Everything is ready for a new happy owner to move in. Relax and enjoy the communal pool (13x8 meters), which from the 13th floor offers a sun terrace with panoramic views of the sea. This apartment is absolutely worth it!

property.subtitle: Modern studio in luxury project
property.description: Studio with 27 sqm. and garden view. This apartment is fully furnished and is located on the 3rd floor of the building. This project has a high standard of living in the city and offers one of the most majestic views of Pattaya all the way to Wongamat Beach. In addition, there is the restrained, luxuriously designed lobby, which gives the customer a great feeling of being welcome.

property.subtitle: Splendid 2 Bedroom Condo resort style
property.description: Fully furnished 2-room apartment with 2 bathrooms and a usable area of 73 sqm on the 3rd floor of the building. The project includes several eight-story resort-style residential buildings. An exotic, tropical swimming pool with waterfalls, sloping beach ridges, pedestrian bridges and evening lanterns is located on the 11 Rai lot of the residence. Adults will find the luxury of hot tubs and a fully equipped gym. For children, the residence also offers a water play pool with slides. The project is located approx. 750 m on foot from Jomtien Beach and is close to several restaurants for medium to fine dining. There is also a supermarket right in front of the entrance gate. All you need to bring is your suitcase.

property.subtitle: Studio with sea view for sale and rent
property.description: Well-kept and minimalist studio unit with a great view of Dong Tan Beach and Pattaya Park Tower and a usable living space of 48 sqm. The studio is fully furnished with a wonderful sea view from the 13th floor, includes complete equipment and is close to all amenities such as shopping, massage, restaurant and much more.

property.subtitle: Seaview studio condo for sale and rent
property.description: Lovely studio unit with 48 square meters of living space and a separate area between the living room and the bedroom, with a fantastic view of Dong Tan Beach and Pattaya Park Tower. Fully furnished, with a stunning sea view and suited on the 17th floor. The project is in location close to the beach and other convenience stores.

property.subtitle: Luxurious condo with 1 bedroom and Sea View
property.description: Beautiful condo with sea view and 59 sqm. living area for sale. The condo is fully furnished and is located in the Wongamat area of Pattaya, close to Terminal 21 Pattaya Shopping Center. Furthermore the Condominium has a nice communal pool, an 24 hours-security service and everything is ready to move in.

property.subtitle: Condo in the city center for sale
property.description: Hot offer! The best price for a renovated 1-bedroom apartment with 50 sqm. The apartment is fully furnished including a fitted kitchen, large living room and storage room. The apartment is located in South Pattaya, 5 minutes drive from the city center, Bali Hai Pier and Walking Street. It is close to a fresh market, 7-11 and Tesco Express.

property.subtitle: Splendid Condo with 1 Bedroom and ocean view
property.description: Sea view apartment with 1 bedroom and 53 sqm. Living space. The apartment is fully furnished including a fully equipped kitchen. This beachfront building offers a tranquil setting that provides easy access to Naklua Beach, just a few minutes' walk away. Wonderful facilities, a beautiful swimming pool and 24 hour security. The residential complex is located near the Terminal 21 shopping center in Pattaya and offers many restaurants, grocery stores, massages and other hotels in the vicinity.

property.subtitle: Seaview studio for sale
property.description: Spacious studio with 52 m² of living space which offers a wonderful sea view from the 21st floor. The studio is located in a condo project on the beach and is fully equipped including a European kitchen corner. The residential building offers complete facilities such as community pools, gardens, children's playground, fitness center and 24-hour security.

property.subtitle: Beachfront condo 1 Bedroom for rent
property.description: Sea view apartment with 1 bedroom and 53 sqm. Living space. The apartment is fully furnished including a fully equipped kitchen. This beachfront building offers a tranquil setting that provides easy access to Naklua Beach, just a few minutes' walk away. Wonderful facilities, a beautiful swimming pool and 24 hour security. The residential complex is located near the Terminal 21 shopping center in Pattaya and offers many restaurants, grocery stores, massages and other hotels in the vicinity.

property.subtitle: Sea view condo with 2 bedrooms on the beach
property.description:
The beautiful 2-room apartment has a living area of 72 square meters, is fully furnished and offers a wonderful view of the sea from the balcony and the bedroom.
This beachfront condominium offers a tranquil setting with easy access to Naklua Beach, just a few minutes' walk away. Wonderful facilities; a beautiful swimming pool and 24-hour security. The residential complex is located near the Terminal 21 shopping center in Pattaya and offers many restaurants, grocery stores, massages and other hotels in the vicinity.
Facilities: - Large infinity pool with whirlpool - Extensive fitness center and clubhouse - Resort style open plan lobby - Sun lounge on the roof terrace - children's playground - Several snooker and table tennis games

property.subtitle: Modern Japanese style condo with 2 bedrooms
property.description:
This unique 2 bedroom apartment has a living area of 63 sqm., It is located on the 29th floor and offers a fantastic sea view, which you can see from the balcony and bedroom. This apartment is completely furnished and ready to move into.
This beachfront condominium offers a tranquil setting with easy access to Naklua Beach, just a few minutes' walk away. Wonderful facilities; a beautiful swimming pool and 24-hour security. The residential complex is located near the Terminal 21 shopping center in Pattaya and offers many restaurants, grocery stores, massages and other hotels in the vicinity.
Facilities: - Large infinity pool with whirlpool - Extensive fitness center and clubhouse - Resort style open plan lobby - Sun lounge on the roof terrace - children's playground - Several snooker and table tennis games

property.subtitle: Fantastic condo 2 Bedroom with ocean view
property.description: The fantastic sea view apartment has 2 bedrooms and has 96 square meters of living space. It is located on the 28th floor of the residential complex. The apartment is fully furnished and has a fitted kitchen. This beachfront condominium offers a tranquil setting with easy access to Naklua Beach, just a few minutes' walk away. Wonderful facilities; a beautiful swimming pool and 24-hour security. The residential complex is located near the Terminal 21 shopping center in Pattaya and offers many restaurants, grocery stores, massages and other hotels in the vicinity.

property.subtitle: Luxurious condo with 2 Bedroom for rent
property.description: Very nice and luxurious apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The apartment is completely furnished and offers you a great sea view. This beachfront condominium offers a tranquil setting with easy access to Naklua Beach, just a few minutes' walk away. Wonderful facilities; a beautiful swimming pool and 24-hour security. The residential complex is located near the Terminal 21 shopping center in Pattaya and offers many restaurants, grocery stores, massages and other hotels in the vicinity.

property.subtitle: House with 5 Bedrooms and private pool
property.description:
Single storey house with 5 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, a garage for two cars and a fully furnished and equipped kitchen.
The house has 525 square meters of land and a private swimming pool and is located in a safe, peaceful and quiet area just 10-15 minutes from Pattaya's Sukhumvit Road and 20 minutes from Jomtien Beach.

property.subtitle: 1 Bedroom Condo with Poolview
property.description: The apartment consists of 35 square meters. Living room with 1 bedroom and is nicely furnished. It is located on the 6th floor and overlooks the pool. The condominium has a beautiful pool area that invites you to relax. The apartment is very well maintained and equipped with beautiful furniture and contains everything you need to live. So you can move in immediately and at a fair price.

property.subtitle: European-style house with a private pool
property.description: This exquisite 3 bedroom property has a private pool and a living area of 104 m². It is located on a 200 square meter. Plot and is fully equipped with a high quality and fully equipped European kitchen. The house is surrounded by palm trees and a well-tended garden. It is well furnished outside and inside. The property itself is furnished with style and taste. Located in a gated community and secure village with 24 hour security, the house is just 10 minutes from the beach and downtown Pattaya.

property.subtitle: Modern designed 4 bedroom house with private pool
property.description: This luxurious house is high quality and modernly furnished and has 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. This house consists of a 940 square meter. Large plot of land with a 10 x 5 meter private "salt water" pool, a spacious garden, a terrace and a carport for two cars. The high quality furnished house has a breathtaking European kitchen, which is equipped with luxury cooking appliances from BOSCH (Germany). The village is located in East Pattaya, near the Mabprachan Lake. It is a luxurious property that is perfectly maintained and has 24 hour security.

property.subtitle: Studio with sea view for sale
property.description:
Great studio with 35 square meters of living space. The studio is fully furnished and offers a beautiful sea view from the balcony. The residential complex is located in the immediate vicinity of the beach which you can reach in a few minutes on foot.
There are a total of 2 apartments available at the same sales price.
